meanings.definition: Resembling a hat in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The mushroom had a hatlike cap on top.
meanings.sent2: Her hatlike umbrella shielded her from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked funny with a hatlike flower on its head.
meanings.sent4: The hill had a hatlike peak against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cookie had a hatlike shape with a round top.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a hat.
meanings.sent1: The hatlike behavior of the robot amused the children.
meanings.sent2: The hatlike design of the building made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The hatlike clouds in the sky seemed to follow us.
meanings.sent4: His hatlike personality always brought a smile to people's faces.
meanings.sent5: The hatlike structure of the nest provided great protection for the birds.
